default_message: ${filename}: Error found: Token of value '${value}' found at line ${line} and column ${column}

error_messages.error_comment_block: ${filename}: Input reached end of file before closing block comment
error_messages.error_bash_block: ${filename}: Input reached end of file before closing bash block
error_messages.error_bash_sub: ${filename}: Input reached end of file before closing bash subshell
error_messages.error_invalid_character: ${filename}: Invalid character '${value}' found at line ${line} and column ${column}
